csv_writer module¶

csv_writer.write_csv(arr, product, file_path)¶

Returns the CSV file with the naming nomenclature as ‘ProductDate_Time’ Parameters- product: product entered by the user, file_path: path where the csv needs to be stored Returns- file_name: CSV file
